articles.description: Mohamed Salah says Trent Alexander-Arnold did not deserve to be booed by some Liverpool fans after the defender announced he will leave his boyhood club this summer.

articles.description: The Premier League is set to adopt IFAB guidelines that would permit only captains to approach referees during matches in a bid to tackle abuse of officials.
articles.title: Premier League: Referees can stop non-captains from approaching them under new rules

articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Juan Ayuso wins seventh stage as Primoz Roglic takes pink jersey off Mads Pedersen

articles.description: Liverpool-based legal firm Hill Dickinson will be the naming rights partner for Everton's new stadium.
